title: Workshop on Strengthening Competencies for Participating in Expert Learning Events

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Process for science practitioners to develop networking and knowledge application strategies through expert-led learning events, featuring real-time interaction and project-based assessment in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three effective networking strategies at expert events and develop implementation plans
Learners can create concrete action roadmaps to apply knowledge acquired from events to practical work
Learners can share knowledge with peer learners using real-time collaboration tools in online event environments with over 80% completion
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
